title: Pictured: Teen boy who was stabbed to death on a Washington D.C. subway by a 15-year-old girl
text:
A 15-year-old girl has been charged with the murder of a teenage boy who was stabbed aboard a Metro train in Washington DC.

Police say 15-year-old Jaquar McNair was stabbed inside an Orange Line Metro train near the US Capitol on Friday.

The boy succumbed to his injuries on Saturday morning.

McNair's school, Charles Hart Middle School located in the downtown D.C. area, tweeted out a picture of him Sunday afternoon.

Police say 15-year-old Jaquar McNair was stabbed inside an Orange Line Metro train near the US Capitol on Friday after a dispute among a group of teens

McNair's school, Charles Hart Middle School located in the downtown DC area, tweeted out a picture of him Sunday afternoon

McNair was stabbed around midday Friday at the Capitol South Metro station, about a block from the Cannon House Office Building

Police say 15-year-old Jaquar McNair was stabbed inside an Orange Line Metro train near the US Capitol around midday on Friday

'Our prayers go out to the family and friends of JaQuar McNair. We will never forget your smile, your laugh your heart,' the school said. 'You were a SOARing Jet and now your are a SOARing Angel. We love you and you will be truly missed.'

The stabbing occurred around midday Friday at the Capitol South Metro station, about a block from the Cannon House Office Building, where some House members have offices.

People gather at the Capitol South Metro Station after McNair was stabbed

Law enforcement officials surround the Capitol South Metro Station where the teenager was stabbed

Police said the attack arose from a dispute among a group of teenagers. They said McNair was taken the hospital and underwent surgery.

Officers found the 15-year-old several blocks from the Metro station.

The girl, whose named has not yet been released, was arrested on a charge of assault with the intent to kill. The charge was upgraded to First Degree Murder following McNair's death.
description: Police say Jaquar McNair, 15, was stabbed inside an Orange Line Metro train near the US Capitol on Friday after a dispute among a group of teens. His middle school tweeted out photos of him Sunday.
